actions.committee: Senate Committee on Public Works (Subsequently: Environment and Public Works)
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works (Subsequently: Environment and Public Works).

official_title: A bill to amend section 311(k) of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to increase the authorization of appropriations for the revolving fund established to finance the removal of oil and hazardous substances discharged into navigable waters, adjoining shorelines and the contiguous zone.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to increase the amount authorized to be appropriated to finance oil and hazardous substances removal activities from $35,000,000 to $60,000,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 311(k) of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to increase the authorization of appropriations for the revolving fund established to finance the removal of oil and hazardous substances discharged into navigable waters, adjoining shorelines and the contiguous zone.
